@included.label: National and University Library "St. Clement of Ohrid"

description: E-CRIS.MK is the Macedonian National CRIS, managed at the National and University Library "St. Klement of Ohrid" in Skopje. The National E-CRIS system includes interconnected databases comprising data on research organisations, researchers and research projects. The register is essential for research monitoring and evaluation. The National E-CRIS system is linked to the national COBISS library information systems, thus allowing direct access to the bibliographies of researchers and institutions. Data entry into the E-CRIS.MK system is mandatory for research organisations and researchers participating in the publicly funded research projects. It is, however, desirable that the E-CRIS.MK system includes all research and development providers in Macedonia and thus contributes to their promotion and collaboration on the national and international level.
name: E-CRIS.MK
